metadata.description: Name of the the environment which is used to generate a short unique hash used in all resources.
Primary location for all resources
Creates an Application Insights instance and a Log Analytics workspace.
Creates a Log Analytics workspace.
Creates an Application Insights instance based on an existing Log Analytics workspace.
Creates a dashboard for an Application Insights instance.

chart.title: Average processor and process CPU utilization

metadata.description: Creates an Azure storage account.
Creates an Azure storage account.
Creates an Azure Storage blob container.

id.value: [resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts/blobServices/containers', split(format('{0}/default/{1}', parameters('storageAccountName'), parameters('name')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', parameters('storageAccountName'), parameters('name')), '/')[1], split(format('{0}/default/{1}', parameters('storageAccountName'), parameters('name')), '/')[2])]

metadata.description: Creates an Azure App Service plan.

value.AZURE_STORAGE_CONNECTION_STRING: [format('DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName={0};AccountKey={1};EndpointSuffix=core.windows.net', reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, if(not(empty(parameters('resourceGroupName'))), parameters('resourceGroupName'), format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').resourcesResourceGroups, parameters('environmentName')))), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'storage-account'), '2022-09-01').outputs.name.value, reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', subscription().subscriptionId, if(not(empty(parameters('resourceGroupName'))), parameters('resourceGroupName'), format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').resourcesResourceGroups, parameters('environmentName')))), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', 'storage-account'), '2022-09-01').outputs.keys.value[0].value)]

metadata.description: Creates an Azure Function in an existing Azure App Service plan.

appSettings.value: [union(parameters('appSettings'), createObject('AzureWebJobsStorage__accountName', if(parameters('storageManagedIdentity'), parameters('storageAccountName'), null()), 'AzureWebJobsStorage', if(parameters('storageManagedIdentity'), null(), format('DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName={0};AccountKey={1};EndpointSuffix={2}', parameters('storageAccountName'), listKeys(resourceId('Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts', parameters('storageAccountName')), '2021-09-01').keys[0].value, environment().suffixes.storage)), 'FUNCTIONS_EXTENSION_VERSION', parameters('extensionVersion'), 'FUNCTIONS_WORKER_RUNTIME', parameters('runtimeName')))]

metadata.description: Creates an Azure App Service in an existing Azure App Service plan.

appSettings.value: [union(parameters('appSettings'), createObject('SCM_DO_BUILD_DURING_DEPLOYMENT', string(parameters('scmDoBuildDuringDeployment')), 'ENABLE_ORYX_BUILD', string(parameters('enableOryxBuild'))), if(and(equals(parameters('runtimeName'), 'python'), equals(parameters('appCommandLine'), '')), createObject('PYTHON_ENABLE_GUNICORN_MULTIWORKERS', 'true'), createObject()), if(and(not(empty(parameters('applicationInsightsName'))), not(equals(reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Insights/components', parameters('applicationInsightsName')), '2020-02-02', 'full'), null()))), createObject('APPLICATIONINSIGHTS_CONNECTION_STRING', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Insights/components', parameters('applicationInsightsName')), '2020-02-02').ConnectionString), createObject()), if(and(not(empty(parameters('keyVaultName'))), not(equals(reference(resourceId('Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults', parameters('keyVaultName')), '2022-07-01', 'full'), null()))), createObject('AZURE_KEY_VAULT_ENDPOINT', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults', parameters('keyVaultName')), '2022-07-01').vaultUri), createObject()))]
